title: A full on assult on the sences
review: This film will change you. Its astounding and has by far some of the most intence scenes in human history

title: Pure Horror
review:
This is 100% horror.
Dont expect jumpscares here. Just horror.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Those 3 hrs flew by!
review: Some may say not much happens, and thats true. Its just a fun film with an absolutly killer ending.Seriously that ending is crazy!

title: This will mess you up
review: The sheer terror i felt and still feel from this twisted and masterful horror(ish) film is incredible.This film is long and for some may be very boring. I completly understand why some people hate this but in my oppinion i dont think any film will reach the level of shock and horror i feel when ever i think of this masterpeice.

title: A Very Griping Tale
review: This directors debut is a showcase of skill and horror. I have nothing else to say other than i highly suggest this film.

title: Good Lord Im Traumatised
review:
A very good film with a killer story (you gotta dig deep to find it) and the most crazy film experience.
Comes close to requiem's ending but for the WHOLE FILM
